text: Which of the following statements is true regarding the microsporocyte?

options.a: Microsporocytes are diploid cells that undergo meiosis to form microspores.
options.b: Microsporocytes are haploid cells that divide to form pollen grains.
options.c: Microsporocytes are formed inside the ovule.

hint: Microsporocytes are diploid cells found in the anther that undergo meiosis to produce haploid microspores.
